channel.title: Comments on: SQL Server Distance Calculation Option 3 – Using the CLR
channel.description: A Technical Community for IT Professionals

item.title: By: Matt
item.dc:creator: Matt
item.content:encoded:
I did some pretty unofficial testing with a SQL CLR function similar to this and saw a drastic performance difference when using the SqlTypes instead of the native data types. Using the native data type (as you have in your example) performed much better.

Just thought I’d throw that out here as an FYI.

Thanks for the post Alex.

item.title: By: Alex Ullrich
item.dc:creator: Alex Ullrich
item.description: Ha, I had to reference your article on deployment over @ http://aspnetlibrary.com/ pretty heavily (in my old posting, I never discussed deployment, just linked to your tutorial). Since the idea was to have everything in one place, figured I should include those bits as well. So nice work to you also :)
